com.asascience.ncsos.describesen

Class SOSDescribeSensorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.asascience.ncsos.service.SOSBaseRequestHandler
      • com.asascience.ncsos.describesen.SOSDescribeSensorHandler

  • public class SOSDescribeSensorHandler
extends SOSBaseRequestHandler
    Main handler class for Describe Sensor requests. Processes the request to determine what output format is being used as well as determine the feature type of the dataset. Also calls the output handler to prepare the output for the response.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    SCowan

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • SOSDescribeSensorHandler

        public SOSDescribeSensorHandler(ucar.nc2.dataset.NetcdfDataset dataset,
                        String responseFormat,
                        String procedure,
                        String uri,
                        String query)
                         throws IOException
        Creates a DescribeSensor handler that will parse the information and setup the output handler
        Parameters:
        dataset - netcdf dataset being read
        responseFormat - response format from the request query string; only accepted response format is "text/xml;subtype=\"sensorML/1.0.1\""
        procedure - procedure of the request (urn of station or sensor)
        uri - entire uri string from the request
        query - entire query string from the request
        Throws:
        IOException

      • SOSDescribeSensorHandler

        public SOSDescribeSensorHandler(ucar.nc2.dataset.NetcdfDataset dataset)
                         throws IOException
        Exception version, used to create skeleton SOSDescribeSensorHandler that can throw an exception
        Parameters:
        dataset - dataset, mostly unused
        Throws:
        IOException
